org.gatein.api.page

Interface Page

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Page>, Describable, Displayable, Serializable

    public interface Page
extends Displayable, Describable, Comparable<Page>, Serializable
    Represents a portal page. Any chances to a page is not perisisted until Portal.savePage(Page) is invoked.
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli

    • Method Summary
